sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.8%.
Year to date, Goldman Sachs Group has lost about 2.2% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike ( NKE ), trading down 3.7%.
Nike is showing a gain of 1.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 1.0%, and JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading up 1.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
